page_header.body_text: We help you voice your opinions at Santa Monica City Council

what_is_engage.header_text: Engage helps you voice your opinions at city council meetings
what_is_engage.body_text: Imagine an app that allows you to stay up-to-date with the local issues that you care about, just as easily as checking your Facebook status. And allows you to voice your concerns about a particular issue directly to the  Santa Monica City Council member responsible for it, just as easily as messaging a friend.

use_engage.body_text: The team is still working hard to make an app! But we would love to hear from you about our prototype and any questions you have for us.

city_council.body_text: It may seem daunting, but we are here to help!
